duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a medical-surgical setting, including wound care, medication administration, and symptom management.
Monitor and record vital signs, provide pain management, and ensure empathy and compassion in patient interactions.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to develop and implement care plans for patients.
Educate patients and their families about medical-surgical conditions and treatment plans.
Assist with patient rehabilitation, discharge planning, and follow-up care.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Nursing (Bachelor's degree preferred)
